schema:creator: Rucker, Bayard
schema:description: [From original label] Upon completion of his individual work contract, the Mexican National is returned to the Reception Center at his American employer's expense and proceeds home to Mexico. This bus load of Mexicans have completed their contracts and are ready for repatriation at the Reception Center. It is common for them to be wearing newly purchased American clothing and carrying luggage filled with American purchases, even including small radios.
schema:name: Mexican National workers being loaded on bus for repatriation
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
